subject: [Phase 4] Create context templates and claude-context CLI
description:
1. Create 8 context templates in claude/templates/contexts/:
   - writing.json, research.json, code.json, design.json, full.json (domain)
   - python.json, web.json, ml.json (framework sub-profiles)
   - Each template sets enabledPlugins for ALL known plugins (explicit is better than implicit)
   - Use exact plugin IDs from installed_plugins.json

2. Create claude-context CLI binary in custom_bins/:
   - `claude-context` — show current profile
   - `claude-context <profile> [sub-profiles...]` — apply profile(s)
   - Multi-profile merging: any plugin true in ANY specified profile → true
   - Writes to .claude/settings.local.json (not .claude/settings.json)
   - Creates .claude/ dir + .gitignore if needed
   - Warns: "Restart Claude Code to apply"

3. Update global settings.json:
   - Explicitly disable ALL non-essential plugins
   - Only always-on plugins enabled by default (superpowers, hookify, plugin-dev, commit-commands, claude-md-management, context7)
   - Plus local-marketplace plugins for the dotfiles project

4. Set dotfiles project settings (.claude/settings.json) with full context

5. Add to deploy.sh: deploy context templates to ~/.claude/templates/contexts/
